original: @133a 'phags pa khros pa zhi bar byed pa ces bya ba'i gzungs /
analyzed: @133a 'phags pa khros pa zhi bar byed pa ces bya ba'i gzungs /

original: dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: ro sha pra sha ma ni sv'a h'a /
analyzed: ro sha pra sha ma ni sv'a h'a /

original: gang khros pa'i mdun du brjod na de khros pa zhi nas nges par 'ong ngo //
analyzed: gang khros pa'i mdun du brjod na de khros pa zhi nas nges par 'ong ngo //
translated: If one recites this in front of an angry person, their anger will be pacified and they will definitely come.

original: khros pa zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: khros pa zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
translated: The Dhāraṇī of Pacifying Anger is complete.
